New Records: Afghanistan's Gurbaz and Zadran had the second-highest opening partnership in T20 World Cup history
Fazalhaq Farooqi took five wickets for just nine runs
Key Match Events: Opening partnership of 154 between Gurbaz and Zadran
Masaba took Afghanistan's first World Cup wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Masaba expressed pride in playing in the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The opening partnership was the second highest in T20 World Cup history
